name: reigikai-website
description: The REIGIKAI SKIF Las Vegas (aka Shotokan Karate-do Club of Las Vegas) founded by Chief Instructor Sensei Ronald Tolentino in February 2006. REIGIKAI-SKIF is a Family-Oriented, Non-Profit Karate program. Our purpose is to teach the positive elements of Karate, with emphasis on respect, honesty, integrity, and discipline both inside and outside of the dojo environment. Our teachings are based on the belief that true Karate transcends the basic elements of technique and athletics into the realm of a way to live one's life. This is Karate-Do, the way of Karate.
author: arielherrera <arielherrera0826@gmail.com>
